ModuleDescription:
Digital platforms have disruptively transformed the way
we live, operate, and interact. Commercially, digital
platform companies have gained legendary success with
their new business models in various industries. The
module consists of four broad aspects, namely, (a) the
foundational theories in platform economics, (b) how to
strategize for and measure successful digital platform
venture, (c) industry-level platforms and how businesses
can develop complementary technologies within a platform
ecosystem, and (d) API management.
